Gentlemen=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 I am trying to find the two world war 2 Japanes=
e sword fitting that serve to lock the blade in the saya.=C2=A0=C2=A0 Kashi=
ra with the button on the side not the top and saya fitting to match. =C2=
=A0 Both are missing from this old piece.=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 I will be selli=
ng it so price is a consideration.=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 It is a late war sword=
 with 2 pegs in the tang and the brown saya 1945 February date on the blade=
.=C2=A0=C2=A0 

Dennis

Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8

<html><body><div style="color:#000; background-color:#fff; font-family:verdana, helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:13px"><div id="yui_3_16_0_1_1442936686132_7161">Gentlemen</div><div dir="ltr" id="yui_3_16_0_1_1442936686132_7163">    I am trying to find the two world war 2 Japanese sword fitting that serve to lock the blade in the saya.   Kashira with the button on the side not the top and saya fitting to match.   Both are missing from this old piece.    I will be selling it so price is a consideration.    It is a late war sword with 2 pegs in the tang and the brown saya 1945 February date on the blade.   <br></div><div id="yui_3_16_0_1_1442936686132_7252" dir="ltr"><br></div><div id="yui_3_16_0_1_1442936686132_7264" dir="ltr">Dennis</div><div dir="ltr"><br></div><div id="yui_3_16_0_1_1442936686132_7128"><br></div></div></body></html>
